titleStmt.title: The key of the Revelation, searched and demonstrated out of the naturall and proper charecters of the visions. With a coment thereupon, according to the rule of the same key, / published in Latine by the profoundly learned Master Joseph Mede B.D. late fellow of Christs College in Cambridge, for their use to whom God hath given a love and desire of knowing and searching into that admirable prophecie. Translated into English by Richard More of Linley in the Countie of Salop. Esquire, one of the Bargesses in this present convention of Parliament. With a præface written by Dr Twisse now prolocutor in the present Assembly of Divines.
Clavis apocalyptica. English
titleStmt.author: Mede, Joseph, 1586-1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: by R.B. for Phil Stephens, at his shop in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the gilded Lion,

notesStmt.note: F.L. = A compendium of Mr. Mede's commentary upon the Revelation containing two prophesies.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
